attributes.action: Require packaging to state that a product has been tested on animals
attributes.additional_details: Over 3 million animals are tested on each year and many of these tests are unnecessary. The bulk of testing can be carried out digitally and therefore this cruelty to animals is unneeded.
attributes.background: We are petitioning for products to advertise their use or lack of cruelty-free testing as a requirement. This allows buyers to make an informed decision on products and their ethics.
